thread.section_title: Cottman of Louisville Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Cottman of Louisville | www.cottmanoflouisville.com
thread.title: Sam Rogers
thread.title_full: Cottman of Louisville reviewed by Sam Rogers

author: Sam Rogers
title: Sam Rogers
text: If you are looking for a shop to get the job done and be 100 % honest and very responsive, look no further. Called the shop and they responded to me within 30 Minutes on a busy Monday morning. They did not charge me to analyze the problem, they got to work immediately and reported all the prices and other small repairs needed for the work that got done an entire clutch swap, they charged me a very fair price. Lastly they were very timely, the whole process was done in a week.
